message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you an exclusive opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll find valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the $1500000 price point. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $900000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm afraid $900000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $1200000.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I understand your position, I still believe we can come to a fair agreement within my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1050000 for the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $1050000, but I'd like to make a slight adjustment to ensure I'm getting a fair deal. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1150000.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value I place on the product and my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1100000 for the product.
I'm starting to feel that we're getting close to a deal, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession to meet you in the middle. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1125000.
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I'm glad we're making progress. I would like to counteroffer at $1112500 for the product.

I'm glad we're still making progress, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $1112500, but I'd like to make one final push to get closer to my target price. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1125000, but I'll throw in a special condition: if you're willing to commit to the purchase today, I'll give you a 2% discount, bringing the price down to $1106250.
Thank you for considering my needs, Alice. I appreciate the discount proposal, but I must stick to my budget. I would like to counteroffer at $1100000 for the product.
